articles.description: Manchester United earn a vital win in their fight for European qualification thanks to Rasmus Hojlund's double in a fast start at Luton.
articles.title: Early Hojlund double seals Man Utd win at Luton

articles.description: England scrum-half Alex Mitchell will miss the Six Nations match against Scotland with a knee injury.
articles.title: Mitchell out of Scotland match with knee injury

articles.description: England captain Harry Kane's late goal at Bochum is not enough as Bayern Munich suffer their third consecutive defeat in nine days.
articles.title: Kane goal not enough as Bayern Munich lose again

articles.description: England must tweak their attacking style if they are to succeed against the best teams, writes Jonathan Agnew.
articles.title: Bazball at a crossroads after Rajkot loss - Agnew

articles.description: Formula 1 urges Red Bull to resolve the controversy surrounding Christian Horner as soon as possible.
articles.title: Christian Horner: Formula 1 wants Red Bull to resolve issues as soon as possible

articles.description: Leah Williamson withdraws from her first England squad since April after injuring her hamstring.
articles.title: Williamson withdraws from England squad

articles.description: Captain Ben Stokes says England do not need to change their method despite crumbling to a 434-run defeat by India in the third Test in Rajkot
articles.title: England do not need to change method - Stokes

articles.description: Rangers move two points clear at the top of the Scottish Premiership with a determined and deserved victory at St Johnstone.
articles.title: Rangers move above Celtic with resolute Perth win

articles.description: La Liga leaders Real Madrid drop points in a draw at neighbours Rayo Vallecano, giving hope to Girona and Barcelona in the Spanish title race.
articles.title: Leaders Real Madrid drop points at Rayo Vallecano

articles.description: Dan Ashworth asks to leave Newcastle, Chelsea monitoring Harry Kane's situation at Bayern Munich, Oliver Glasner agrees Crystal Palace deal, plus more.
articles.title: Ashworth asks to leave Newcastle - Monday's gossip
